channel.title: Training Rigor Introduction
channel.description: This blog is intended to facilitate understand and discussion of how to evaluate and improving the rigor in vocational training.

item.title: Rigor intro
item.author: Brent Stone
item.description: The concept of rigor in training and education can be surprisingly complex and difficult for an organization to get right. This introduction to the topic focuses on how a specific stated learning objective's rigor can be measured using estimates for total hours to complete the goal and its alignment to Bloom's Taxonomy of Learning. A more detailed explanation of the concepts discussed can be found in the whitepaper in the github project listed in the "Related links" section of this page.
